snippet: A federal report on mental health care in Los Angeles County jails says the environment is “deplorable” and not enough is being done to prevent inmate suicides.
abstract: Justice Department assessment reports that mental health care in Los Angeles County jails is 'deplorable' and not enough is being done to prevent inmate suicides.
lead_paragraph: A federal report on mental health care in Los Angeles County jails says the environment is “deplorable” and not enough is being done to prevent inmate suicides.

headline.main: California: Report Faults Los Angeles Jails
headline.print_headline: California: Report Faults Los Angeles Jails
